commits.message:
Merge pull request #2060 from eucalyptus/GUI-2736

GUI-2736: GUI CORS Configuration Support
GUI-2736: Enable CodeMirror auto tag completion in CORS config XML textarea
GUI-2736: Broadcast saved event when saving CORS config in modal

GUI-2736: Move setting CORS config XHR call to an AngularJS service

Also, change request method for saving CORS config from POST to PUT; add missing files to karma.conf.js
GUI-2736: Remove namespace, disable button, and show loading indicator when saving CORS config
GUI-2736: Add RelaxNG schema for CORS config XML; add utility method and unit tests for schema validation
GUI-2736: Initial progress incorporating CORS Configuration modal dialog
GUI-2736: Fix typo and button styles in CORS config dialog
GUI-2736: Refactor CORS config XHR put/delete handlers into distinct view
GUI-2736: Fix typo

GUI-2736: Bump down font size in CodeMirror textarea

Also, improve comments for modal-position mixin

GUI-2736: Pull in modal dependency to avoid breaking bucket item details and bucket upload pages

Also add modal.js to karma conf file to pass unit tests

GUI-2736: Show "Add CORS Configuration" button after config is deleted via confirmation dialog

Also display edit/delete icons after initially adding a CORS config

GUI-2736: Initial progress handling CORS XML namespace

Also simplify XML string parsing via lxml
GUI-2736: Pre-populate CORS Configuration dialog when adding a config
GUI-2736: Remove external link to sample CORS configurations
GUI-2736: Configure $httpBackend to handle eucaroutes.json call in CORS config directive unit test
GUI-2736: Add tooltips for edit/delete CORS config icons
GUI-2736: Convert add/edit CORS Configuration dialog to Angular-based modal

GUI-2736: Compare exception class rather than error message in malformed XML unit test

Error message comparison seems inconsistent across platforms
GUI-2736: Initial progress incorporating XML validation in CORS config dialog

GUI-2736: Update readme for lxml dependency requirements

Also update 'yum install' with 'dnf install' for Fedora instructions
GUI-2736: Fix button styles in Delete CORS Config confirmation dialog
GUI-2736: Insert missing semicolon in unit test
GUI-2736: Allow ID element in CORSRule; enforce nonNegativeInteger for MaxAgeSeconds

GUI-2736: Remove unneeded $timeout when opening CORS config modal

Also, clean up CORS dialog HTML and add missing i18n attributes
GUI-2736: Move CORS config deletion XHR call to a service
GUI-2736: Better handling of malformed XML errors when saving CORS config
GUI-2736: Update TravisCI dependencies for lxml
GUI-2736: Initial progress allowing CORS configuration for S3 buckets
GUI-2736: Avoid target="_blank" when opening sample CORS configs page in new window
GUI-2736: More RESTful endpoints for setting/deleting CORS config
GUI-2736: Add unit test to check for optional ID element per CORS rule
GUI-2736: Leverage CodeMirror for CORS config textarea
GUI-2736: Fix failing JS unit test and add another for controller options
GUI-2736: Simplify XML namespace removal
GUI-2736: Allow CORS configuration to be set via Add/Edit operations
GUI-2736: Also log PUT and DELETE requests as user actions
GUI-2736: Better default for MaxAgeSeconds in pre-populated CORS config
GUI-2736, GUI-2757: Allow modal dialog positioning to be configurable
GUI-2736: Safer handling of namespace removal when loading details page

GUI-2736: Combine CORS XML validation with configuration view

Also display error message in dialog when validation fails
GUI-2736: Allow CORS configuration removal via confirmation dialog

GUI-2736: Set hasCorConfig client-side; use $rootScope for events

Also, simplify CSRF token lokup and clean up JS unit tests

GUI-2736: Move modal.js in karma conf to avoid merge conflicts with 5.0 branch

Also, use better expectation checks in JS unit tests
GUI-2736: Add more JS unit tests

GUI-2736: Reset to sample config when re-adding CORS XML after deletion

Also, use ng-model instead of jQuery to obtain new CORS XML from textarea

GUI-2736: Strip blank padding surrounding CORS config when validating XML

Also, add a unit test to determine if the xml version/encoding stanza is allowed
GUI-2736: Better handling of CORS config deletion via confirmation dialog
GUI-2736: Always open Sample CORS Configurations link in new window to avoid cross-browser issues
GUI-2736: Add CORS config unit test
